pkgmetadata.longdescription: Approximate POMDP Planning Software // A toolkit for Partially Observed Markov Decision Processes (POMDP). Provides bindings to C++ libraries implementing the algorithm SARSOP (Successive Approximations of the Reachable Space under Optimal Policies) and described in Kurniawati et al (2008), doi:10.15607/RSS.2008.IV.009. This package also provides a high-level interface for generating, solving and simulating POMDP problems and their solutions.
